EN: The Town Center provides the foundation necessary to grow your city.
Allows building a farm and a lumbermill. Town center can hold a maximum of 700 crop, 700 wood, and 200 iron.
Enables building barracks. Increases the maximum resources to 1100 crop, 1100 wood, and 300 iron.
Allows building university and foundries. Increases the maximum resources to 1600 crop, 1600 wood, and 500 iron.
Ability to build another farm and lumbermill. Increases the maximum resources to 2500 crop, 2500 wood, and 800 iron.
Allows building trading posts, and stables.  Increases the maximum resources to 3800 crop, 3800 wood, and 1200 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 5700 crop, 5700 wood, and 1800 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 8700 crop, 8700 wood, and 2800 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 13200 crop, 13200 wood, and 4400 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 20100 crop, 20100 wood, and 6800 iron.
Increases the maximum resources to 30000 crop, 30000 wood, and 10000 iron.
Enables the ability to train advanced military units without requiring laborers.
Enables upgrading fighters, pikemen, and bowmen
Enables the ability to train your laborers into military units and provides defensive structures.
Decreases training time by 5%. Allows converting the structure to a Barrack.
Uses the city's laborers to grow and produce crops.
Allows a maximum of 20 laborers to work in the farm.
Increases the farm to support a maximum of 45 laborers.
Increases the farm to support a maximum of 70 laborers.
Increases the farm to support a maximum of 95 laborers.
Increases the farm to support a maximum of 120 laborers.

Increases the farm to support a maximum of 170 laborers.
Increases the farm to support a maximum of 195 laborers.
Increases the farm to support a maximum of 215 laborers.
Increases the farm to support a maximum of 240 laborers.
Use the city's laborers to produce wood and develop underground storage to protect resources.
Allows gathering wood from level 1 forests.
Allows gathering from 2 forests simultaneously.  Ability to build basement to hide resources.
Allows gathering wood from level 2 forests.
Allows gathering wood from level 3 forests.
Allows gathering wood from level 4 forests.
Allow the city's laborer to use wood to repair buildings after they have been damaged in combat.
Increases to a maximum of 10 laborers. One labor can repair up to 10 HP every 30 minutes. Each HP restored will cost 1 wood.
Increases to a maximum of 20 laborers. One labor can repair up to 10 HP every 30 minutes. Each HP restored will cost 1 wood.
Increases to a maximum of 30 laborers. One labor can repair up to 10 HP every 30 minutes. Each HP restored will cost 1 wood.  Enable technology A-Call-To-Arm.
Increases to a maximum of 40 laborers. One labor can repair up to 10 HP every 30 minutes. Each HP restored will cost 1 wood.  Upgrade underground architectural research.
Increases to a maximum of 50 laborers. One labor can repair up to 10 HP every 30 minutes. Each HP restored will cost 1 wood.  Ability to remove structures.
Increases storage space to hide 100 crop 100 wood.
Increases storage space to hide 200 crop 200 wood 50 gold.
Increases storage space to hide 300 crop 300 wood 100 gold 50 iron.
Increases storage space to hide 500 crop 500 wood  200 gold 100 iron.
Increases storage space to hide 1000 crop 1000 wood 400 gold 200 iron.
Enables upgrading calvary and heavy calvary.
Ability to train siege engines such as catapults and helepolis.
Allows researching technologies that improve your city in various ways and decreases labor Training time.
Decreases Labor Training time by  2% and allows building Armory.
Decreases Labor Training time by  4% and enables upgrading Hanzo Sword technology.
Decreases Labor Training time by  6% and allows building Blacksmith.
Decreases Labor Training time by  8% and enables upgrading Archery Research to Lvl 1.
Decreases Labor Training time by  10% and enables upgrading Archery Research to Lvl 2.
Allows building workshop.  Decreases Labor Training time by  15% and enables upgrading Archery Research to Lvl 4.
Allows researching technologies that improve your city's military defense.
Allows researching technologies that improve your city's military offense.
Provides defense to nearby buildings during an attack.
Protects buildings within a 1 tile radius.
Increases radius to cover 2 tiles. Allows converting the tower to a structure that is stronger against units with wooden armor.
Provides defense to nearby buildings during an attack. Strong against enemies with wooden armor.
Protects buildings within a 1 tile radius.
Allows sending caravans with resources to other players. Gives the ability to build a market.
